trans-unit.source: How to: Publish a Service to the Service Bus Registry
trans-unit.target: How to: Publish a Service to the Service Bus Registry

trans-unit.source: The <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="true">T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.ServiceRegistrySettings</codeEntityReference> endpoint behavior gives you control over how a given service is published in the <newTerm>service registry</newTerm>.
trans-unit.target: The <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="true">T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.ServiceRegistrySettings</codeEntityReference> endpoint behavior gives you control over how a given service is published in the <newTerm>service registry</newTerm>.

trans-unit.source: By default, all services are "cloaked" and are not visible in the service registry ATOM feed.
trans-unit.target: By default, all services are "cloaked" and are not visible in the service registry ATOM feed.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that you can set on the <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="false">T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.ServiceRegistrySettings</codeEntityReference> endpoint:
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the properties that you can set on the <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="false">T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.ServiceRegistrySettings</codeEntityReference> endpoint:

trans-unit.source: This is the display name for the endpoint and is used as the <codeInline>%%amp;lt;title%%amp;gt;</codeInline> field for the endpoint in the discovery ATOM feed.
trans-unit.target: This is the display name for the endpoint and is used as the <codeInline>%%amp;lt;title%%amp;gt;</codeInline> field for the endpoint in the discovery ATOM feed.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="true">P:Microsoft.ServiceBus.ServiceRegistrySettings.DisplayName</codeEntityReference> property is set to the last segment of the service URI.
trans-unit.target: By default, the <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="true">P:Microsoft.ServiceBus.ServiceRegistrySettings.DisplayName</codeEntityReference> property is set to the last segment of the service URI.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to the <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="true">F:Microsoft.ServiceBus.DiscoveryType.Public</codeEntityReference> or <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="true">F:Microsoft.ServiceBus.DiscoveryType.Private</codeEntityReference> values, with the latter being the default.
trans-unit.target: This property is set to the <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="true">F:Microsoft.ServiceBus.DiscoveryType.Public</codeEntityReference> or <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="true">F:Microsoft.ServiceBus.DiscoveryType.Private</codeEntityReference> values, with the latter being the default.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="false">F:Microsoft.ServiceBus.DiscoveryType.Public</codeEntityReference>, the endpoint is published into the Service Registry ATOM feed.
trans-unit.target: If you set this property to <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="false">F:Microsoft.ServiceBus.DiscoveryType.Public</codeEntityReference>, the endpoint is published into the Service Registry ATOM feed.

trans-unit.source: To add an application to the Service Bus registry
trans-unit.target: To add an application to the Service Bus registry

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of the <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="false">T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.ServiceRegistrySettings</codeEntityReference> behavior, using the <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="false">F:Microsoft.ServiceBus.DiscoveryType.Public</codeEntityReference> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Create an instance of the <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="false">T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.ServiceRegistrySettings</codeEntityReference> behavior, using the <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="false">F:Microsoft.ServiceBus.DiscoveryType.Public</codeEntityReference> parameter.

trans-unit.source: Add the description to the associated endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Add the description to the associated endpoint.
